In this regard, ECA places emphasis on supporting efforts to eradicate poverty, placing African countries on the path of growth and sustainable development, reversing the marginalization of Africa in the globalization process, and accelerating the empowerment of women. It aims to provide significant technical support to the African Peer Review Mechanism (APRM) and" /><meta id="MetaKeywords" name="KEYWORDS" content="Carlos Lopes, Africa, Regional Integration, Governance , ICT, Science and Technology, Statistics, Sustainable Development, Poverty Reduction, MDGs, global challenges,DotNetNuke,DNN" /><meta id="MetaCopyright" name="COPYRIGHT" content="&amp;copy; 2012 Economic Commission for Africa" /><meta id="MetaGenerator" name="GENERATOR" content="DotNetNuke " /><meta id="MetaAuthor" name="AUTHOR" content="Economic Commission for Africa" /><meta name="RESOURCE-TYPE" content="DOCUMENT" /><meta name="DISTRIBUTION" content="GLOBAL" /><meta id="MetaRobots" name="ROBOTS" content="INDEX, FOLLOW" /><meta name="REVISIT-AFTER" content="1 DAYS" /><meta name="RATING" content="GENERAL" /><meta http-equiv="PAGE-ENTER" content="RevealTrans(Duration=0,Transition=1)" /><style id="StylePlaceholder" type="text/css"></style><link href="/Portals/_default/default.css?cdv=4377" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet"/><link href="/DesktopModules/CrossArticle/module.css?cdv=4377" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet"/><link href="/Portals/_default/Containers/DarkKnight/container.css?cdv=4377" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet"/><link href="/Portals/0/portal.css?cdv=4377" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet"/><link href="/admin/ControlPanel/module.css?cdv=4377" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet"/><link href="/Portals/_default/Skins/_default/WebControlSkin/Default/ComboBox.Default.css?cdv=4377" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet"/><script src="/Resources/Shared/Scripts/jquery/jquery.min.js?cdv=4377" type="text/javascript"></script><script src="/Resources/Shared/Scripts/jquery/jquery-ui.min.js?cdv=4377" type="text/javascript"></script><link href="http://new.uneca.org/default.aspx" rel="canonical" /><link rel='SHORTCUT ICON' href='/Portals/0/eca_favicon.ico' type='image/x-icon' />

        //<![CDATA[
        
        //This code is to force a refresh of browser cache
        //in case an old version of dnn.js is loaded
        //It should be removed as soon as .js versioning is added
        jQuery(document).ready(function () {
            if (navigator.userAgent.indexOf(" Chrome/") == -1) {
                if ((typeof dnnJscriptVersion === 'undefined' || dnnJscriptVersion !== "6.0.0") && typeof dnn !== 'undefined') {
                    window.location.reload(true);
